title: Madhya Pradesh: NSA Invoked Against 4 For Throwing Cow Head Into Temple In Ratlam
comments:
Absolutely deserving!
Jaora has a huge shrine which is visited by lot of Hindus as well.
Any attempt to disrupt peace must be dealt with severely.
Standard false flag mischief orchestrated by hindutvavadis.
It's sick yes but how is this a national security problem? Unconstitutional AF.

>Any attempt to disrupt peace must be dealt with severely.

For all I can guess, it might be some rogue Hindus trying to do that. 🤔
Guaranteed, it's a typical play out of the RSS handbook.
Not fake news. Happened last week- https://indianexpress.com/article/india/cow-parts-thrown-into-temple-in-mp-nsa-slapped-against-4-arrested-accused-9394994/
Have you read the actual news?

“ASP Rakesh Khakha on Saturday said provisions of the NSA have been invoked against the four accused, identified as Salman Mevati (24), Shakir Qureshi (19) Noshad Qureshi (40) and Shahrukh Sattar (25).” 

Yeah, totally
